programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae cerdyn post o Hawaii gan Wncwl Wil yn ysbrydoli Anni a Lili i ail greu Hawaii yn y gegin! A postcard from Hawaii from Uncle Wil inspires Anni and Lili to create Hawaii in the kitchen!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Dyl yn ennill y fraint o fod yn Chff am y dydd ac yn penderfynu difetha cerflun Crawc. Dyl wins Chiff's offer of being Chiff for a day and proposes to deface the statue of Crawc.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn l
programme.desc: Stori o adeg y Rhyfel Byd Cyntaf sydd gan Tadcu heddiw. Mae Tomi a Gwen wedi bod yn gofalu am lysiau ar gyfer y gystadleuaeth arddio. Grandad has a story from the First World War today.

programme.title: Y Doniolis
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r Doniolis yn cynnal ocsiwn ac yn llwyddo i werthu darn gwerthfawr iawn i Mrs Rowlands. The Doniolis hold an auction and manage to sell a valuable piece to Mrs Rowlands.

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae Snorcferch yn cael ei swyno gan y newydd-ddyfodiad Mr Brys, pencampwr chwaraeon gaeaf carismataidd a di-flewyn-ar-dafod. Moomintrol struggles to win back Snorcferch from another.

programme.title: Parti
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yng Nghaerffili yn helpu trefnu Parti Hwyl Fawr i Giorgios, sy'n ymfudo i Awstralia. The crew are in Caerphilly helping arrange a Goodbye Party for someone moving to Australia.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

programme.title: Pl-droed: Cymru v Yr Eidal
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau gm ola Cynghrair Cenhedloedd Menywod UEFA: Cymru v Yr Eidal. Stadiwm Swansea.com. Highlights of the UEFA Women's Nations League final game: Wales v Italy. Swansea.com Stadium.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Mae Aeron Pughe a Malen Meredydd yn ymuno gyda ni am sgwrs a chan, ac fe gwrddwn chast Y Smyrffs. Aeron Pughe and Malen Meredydd join us for a chat and song, and we meet The Smurfs cast.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Mentra Ffion allan i'r pentref eto gan achosi tipyn o bryder i Tom a Jinx. Mae'n rhaid i Dani daro bargen gyda'r diafol. Dani must make a deal with the devil to ensure a friend's freedom.

programme.title: New: Hafiach
programme.desc: Wrth i arholiadau criw o ddisgyblion orffen mae'n amser dathlu, ond ceir darganfyddiad erchyll cyn pen dim. Themau aeddfed. A horrible discovery befalls some GCSE revellers. Adult themes.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: New: Busnes Bwyd
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae 6 o gynhyrchwyr ac entrepreneuriaid bwyd yn cystadlu am 5K a chynllun mentora unigryw. New series. 6 food entrepreneurs compete for a 5K prize and mentoring scheme.

programme.title: Prosiect Pum Mil
programme.desc: Gyda chyllid o ddim ond 5000, mae'r criw yn trawsnewid Neuadd Santes Helen, Penisarwaun. With funding of just 5000, the team transform St. Helen's Hall, Penisarwaun.

programme.title: Hansh: Mwy Na Daffs a Taffs
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Miriam Isaac sy'n darganfod be mae rhai o influencers mwya adnabyddus Prydain yn meddwl am Gymru. New series. First up: Gemma Collins immerses herself in all things Welsh.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae'r Olobobs wedi mynd am dro yn y goedwig ac yn dod o hyd i Ffosibob coll. The Olobobs are enjoying a nice walk in the forest when they bump into a poor little lost Fozzybob.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Glenys yn siarsio Teifion i gadw Digbi draw oddi wrth ei ffrindiau er mwyn iddi hi ymuno nhw. Glenys orders Teifion to keep Digbi away from his friends while she joins them.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Lewis yn gofyn, 'Sut mae gwneud paent?' ac mae Tad-cu'n sn wrtho am antur arbennig efo cymeriadau amrywiol. Lewis asks how do you make paint? Tadcu tells him about a special adventure.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'Rhen Gerwyn yn mwynhau sn am ei anturiaethau ar y mr ac yn codi ofn ar Twt wrth sn am fwystfilod mr. Twt doesn't believe in sea monsters but will he change his mind?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae Wini eisiau casglu fflwff gwyn sy'n hedfan. Mae'r Whws yn darganfod bod y fflwff yn dod o ddant y llew. Wynona wants to collect some white flying fluff and they learn about dandelions.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin ac Izzy'n penderfynu cyfuno gwaith cartre' Izzy gyda chwilio am fwyar duon i'r bwyty. Sin takes Izzy into the countryside so that she can spot all the animals for her homework.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Meic a Norman yn cystadlu am gynulleidfa i'w sioeau. Mae pethe'n gwaethygu pan mae arwyddbost Meic yn cynnau ac yn anelu am lori danwydd enfawr. Mike and Norman compete for an audience.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wrth ddychwelyd adre' ar l antur ar afon yn Affrica, mae'r Octonots yn cael trafferth mynd heibio criw o hipos mawr. The Octonauts have trouble getting past a gang of large hippos.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad gan Matilda yng ngorsaf yr heddlu - mae 'na broblem cwpwrdd-styc! Harri gets a call from Matilda at the police station - there's a problem with a stuck cupboard!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n noson gynnes iawn ac mae pawb yn cael trafferth cysgu. It's a hot night and no-one can get to sleep.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Llyfr Swyn yn gwneud y camgymeriad o ddewis Cochyn fel ei disgybl newydd. Spellbook makes the mistake of taking Conyn on as her new apprentice!

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Ceio'r Ci Cwl yn poeni am golli ei dalent. Tybed all Deryn y Bwn ei helpu i ail ddarganfod ei sgil cerddorol? Ceio the Cool Dog is worried. He's lost his ability to write cool songs!

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: 'Gwdihw' yw'r gair newydd ond tybed ble mae dod o hyd i un? Today's word is 'owl'. Who will be chosen to search for the 'owl' and where will they find it?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips. Today's theme is the weather.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Wrth syllu ar yr awyr yn y nos ma'n bosib gweld tylluan, seren wb, golau'r Gogledd, awyren, lloeren neu anifail. When you look at the night sky, you might see an owl or a shooting star!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero a'i ffrindiau'n mynd i gartre'r cwmwl Wadin i gyfarfod ei theulu, daw'n fellt a tharanau wrth i frawd bach Wadin gael y fflachglwy'. Blero and friends visit Wadin the Cloud.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jambor.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Yn y ffair mae Joni'n awyddus i chwarae'r gemau fel y myn, tra ceisia Jason ddysgu gwerth strategaeth iddo. Joni is keen to play the fair games as he wants, while Jason values strategy.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Dderwen sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Dderwen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Pan ddaw hi'n amser mynd i gartref Gyrdi, mae'r criw yn sylweddoli ei bod hi'n amhosib i bawb ffitio y tu mewn i'w gragen! The gang have a probem fitting inside Gurdy's shell!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Glenys Gas yn syrthio i mewn i drap roedd hi'n ei wneud ar gyfer Digbi. Glenys Gas falls into a tricksy-trap she was making for Digbi and can't climb out.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Nel yn gofyn 'Pam bod gwyfynod yn hoffi golau?' ac mae Tad-cu'n ateb mai gwyfynod ddyfeisiodd golau. Nel asks why moths like the light, and Tadcu tells her that moths invented light.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Wrth fynd allan i'r mr, mae Twt a Tanwen yn dod o hyd i forfil yn sownd yn y rhew. Twt and Tanwen come across a whale stuck in the ice. How will they free him?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Fun with characters like Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn tybio bod artist wedi paentio patrwm sgwiglyd ar do Tomi. Ond ma nhw'n dysgu mwy am wlithod! The Woohoos wonder who on earth has painted a squiggly pattern on Scotty's roof?

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae'r pentrefwyr yn helpu Magi gasglu cnwd o fefus. Yn anffodus, wedi damwain gyda phl droed, mae'r mefus yn cael eu malu. A mishap with a football results in Magi's fruits being crushed.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym mhentre Pontypandy heddiw? What's happening in Pontypandy today?

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wedi i Cregynnog a Harri gael damwain, maen nhw'n cael help gan Lysywen Farus a physgodyn Grwper. Cregynnog and Harri crash their Gups and need some help from an eel and a grouper fish.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: A bookshelf has broken in Carmarthen library; Harry goes to help Gruff and Yvonne fix it. Yn llyfrgell Caerfyrddin, ma silff lyfrau wedi torri - ffwrdd a Harri i helpu Yvonne a Gruff.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Yr artist Steve 'Pablo' Jones sy'n pacio bag ac off i Eglwys Sant Paul, Llundain ble mae'n cwrdd ag Aled Jones er mwyn gwneud portread ohono. Artist Steve 'Pablo' Jones portrays Aled Jones. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Mae Aeron Pughe a Malen Meredydd yn ymuno gyda ni am sgwrs a chan, ac fe gwrddwn chast Y Smyrffs. Aeron Pughe and Malen Meredydd join us for a chat and song, and we meet The Smurfs cast.

programme.title: Gerddi Cymru
programme.desc: Dwy ardd gyferbyniol sy'n cael sylw Aled Samuel heddiw - Gardd Goedwig Colby a gardd Castell Penrhyn ar gyrion Bangor. Another chance to see Colby Woodland Garden and Penrhyn Castle Garden.

programme.title: Gerddi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfle arall i ymweld Bro Morgannwg i weld dwy ardd sy'n hollol wahanol i'w gilydd ond yn wledd i'r llygaid. Another chance to visit the gardens at Dyffryn, and Cowbridge Physic Garden.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Fe ddathlwn Ddiwrnod yr Amgylchedd yn y gornel ffasiwn a chawn dysgu mwy am brosiect 'Ynni Da'. We celebrate Environment Day in the fashion corner and also learn about the 'Ynni Da' project.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Prosiect Pum Mil
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn nhref Rhydaman yr wythnos hon i helpu cangen Derwen Newydd o elusen y Wallich. The gang are in Ammanford this week to help the Derwen Newydd branch of the Wallich charity.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn darganfod olion traed MAWR ac ma' nhw eisiau gwybod i ba greadur anhygoel maen nhw'n perthyn. The Woohoos discover some BIG muddy footprints footprints - who do they belong to?

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn paratoi salad Eidalaidd ond yna mae diflaniad mochyn Magi'n denu ei sylw. Sin gets ingredients together for a classic Italian salad but is distracted when Magi's pig escapes.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Hoffai ffrindiau Deryn y Bwn fynd ar eu gwyliau ond does gan neb arian. Mae angen cynllun! The Bitten Bird's friends would love to go on holiday: time to think up a moneymaking scheme!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Wedi cael llond bol ar wneud ei jig-so dinosor mae Blero'n mynd i Ocido ac yn cael gwneud rhywbeth llawer mwy difyr! Blero is bored with his dino-jigsaw. Can he find something better to do?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r cymeriadau bach dwl yn cynnal eu fersiwn nhw o sioe ffasiwn! This time, the crazy little characters hold their version of a fashion show!

programme.title: Cath-Od
programme.desc: Mae Macs am ymuno a'r Cylch Heulwen, ond cyn gwneud hynny bydd raid iddo sefyll y Cathbrawf. Macs want to join the Sunshine Circle but first he must complete some tests!

programme.title: LEGO DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Mae ymweliad annisgwyl gan Brif Arolygydd y Noswylfa yn gorfodi Mateo i guddio Sed-Blob. A surprise visit from the Chief Inspector of the Night Bureau forces Mateo to hide Sed-Blob.

programme.title: New: EPIG
programme.desc: Cyfle i weld beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y campau anturus. Y tro hwn, bydd Lauren a Josie yn nigwyddiad syrffio ym Mryste. This time, Lauren and Josie are at a surfing event in Bristol.

programme.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
programme.desc: Amser i Beti a Huw orffen y daith, a lle gwell i wneud hynny nag yn yr Albion yn Aberteifi. The duo are at the Albion in Cardigan, and also enjoy a local boat cruise and homemade pizza.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Caiff Lowri ddyddiad ei llawdriniaeth, ac mae'r newyddion, er yn peri gofid, hefyd yn rhoi hwb iddi hi ffocysu ar fod yn bositif. Philip is on pins as he awaits an answer from Terry.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Ry' ni'n ymweld champfa Jiu Jitsu Aberteleri, ac mae'r pel-droediwr, Megan Bowen, yma'n westai. We visit the Abertillery Jiu Jitsu gym, and footballer, Megan Bowen, is a guest on the sofa.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Aiff Tom i weld Ffion a sylweddola'r ddau bod ganddynt sawl peth yn gyffredin. After seeing Anita's old photos, Kelly gets a bright idea. Gwern revises with Gaynor - but will Tom be happy?

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Arthur dal ar drywydd y lladron, ond 'dyw'n cael fawr o lwyddiant ac mae ganddo dipyn o waith esbonio i bawb. Over at the Iard shop, Elliw panics when Iolo almost discovers her secret.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: New: Joe Allen: Y Chwiban Olaf
programme.desc: Rhaglen yn dilyn Joe Allen wrth iddo wynebu penderfyniad caletaf ei yrfa - dal ati i chwarae neu cerdded i ffwrdd. Documentary following Joe Allen through a season like no other.

programme.title: Stori'r Iaith: Sean Fletcher
programme.desc: Wynebau enwog sy'n mynd ar daith bersonol i ddarganfod mwy am hanes yr iaith Gymraeg. Y tro hwn: Sean Fletcher. We explore the history of the Welsh language.

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Mae rhaglen ola'r gyfres yn mynd ni o Angle hyd at ddiwedd llwybr yr arfordir yn Amroth. The final episode takes us from Angle all the way to the end of the coastal path in Amroth.

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: Red Sand. Western starring Richard Eyer, Robert Bray & Dean Jones. During a ferocious sandstorm, Simon Kane spots a man lying by the side of the road. [S]

programme.desc: 1950. Comedy. Director: Godfrey Grayson. Stars Edward Rigby, Henry Mollison, Michael Ward. An Earl returns from a tropical island and finds a tribal king's daughter has stowed away in his luggage. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the French Interpreter. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. When an interpreter says he was kidnapped, Sherlock investigates further. [S]

programme.title: You Will Remember
programme.desc: 1941. Musical drama. Directed by Jack Raymond. Stars: Robert Morley, Emlyn Williams, Dorothy Hyson. Based on the life of the English composer Leslie Stuart, famous in the British music halls. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: Telly Savalas Looks at Aberdeen. 1981. A delightful film which shows a great love for Scotland, with some fascinating facts in true Baim style. [S]

programme.title: Stolen Face
programme.desc: 1952. Drama. Directed by Terence Fisher. Stars Paul Henreid & Lizabeth Scott. A doctor makes a female convict look like the pianist who left him, but can she really be the woman he loves? [S]

programme.title: Dentist In The Chair
programme.desc: 1960. Comedy. Stars Bob Monkhouse, Peggy Cummins, Kenneth Connor. A burglar breaks into the wrong shop and steals medical instruments instead of silver. [S]

programme.title: Cause For Alarm!
programme.desc: 1951. Drama. Director: Tay Garnett. Stars Loretta Young, Barry Sullivan & Bruce Cowling. An unwell man accuses his wife and doctor of plotting to kill him, causing trouble after his sudden death. [S]

programme.title: Singing Through
programme.desc: 1935. Comedy. Directed by Max Mack. Stars Bobbie Comber, Bertha Belmore & Cecil Ramage. A rural man is duped into schemes that lead him to London. [S]

programme.title: It's in the Groove!
programme.desc: 1949. A wonderful look at the rise of the record industry, from its primitive beginnings to the unveiling of the formats that would revolutionise the world of popular music: the LP and the single.

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: There Was a Little Girl - Part 1. 1973. Stars John Flanagan & Veronica Lang. Fiona Gray is charged with burning down her husband's house. The defence claims she was in a state of 'automatism'. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: There Was a Little Girl - Part 2. 1973. Stars Ingrid Hafner, Denis Lill & Maxine Audley. Rick Gray's evidence provides an insight into Fiona's persona, but will this help or hinder her case? [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: There Was a Little Girl - Part 3. 1973. Stars Veronica Lang, Dorothy Vernon & Denis Lill. Taking to the witness box, Fiona refuses to answer questions about her motivation in starting the fire. [S]

programme.title: The Ghost of Greville Lodge
programme.desc: 2000. Mystery. Directed by Niall Johnson. Starring Jon Newman, Prunella Scales, Marc Danbury and George Cole. A teenager stays at his uncle's mansion, where he discovers the house's many secrets. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: Say Abracadabra. 1954. Enter The Magic Circle and enjoy a spectacular show with performances from a brilliant selection of magicians.

programme.title: Those British Faces
programme.desc: 1993. Documentary series that acts as a tribute to the greats of British cinema. This episode focuses on a magnificent tribute to Miles Malleson. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: An Obituary for a Champion. 1961. Stars John Ireland & Howard Marion-Crawford. When champion boxer Kirk Carter is found drowned on the eve of his next fight, John Hunter is asked to investigate. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Bonus. 1976. Stars Richard Easton & Patrick O'Connell. Brian and Edward have reservations about Hammonds merging with Van der Merwe, but Paul Merroney is determined to find out the advantages. [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man
programme.desc: On the Hook. 1985. Stars Leigh Lawson, Tom Wilkinson & Eileen Pollock. Holed up in remote farmland, Lomax soon becomes a suspect in a rustling case but finds help from a former prison inmate. [S]

programme.title: Lost for Words
programme.desc: 1999. Drama. Directed by Deric Longden. Stars Pete Postlethwaite & Thora Hird. When Deric's eccentric mother suffers from a stroke, leaving her lost for words, their world undergoes a huge change. [S]

programme.title: Man Who Cheated Himself
programme.desc: 1950. Crime. Director: Felix E. Feist. Stars Lee J. Cobb, Jane Wyatt & John Dall. A homicide detective who witnesses his girlfriend kill her husband is assigned to the case, alongside his brother. [S]

programme.desc: The Princess Problem: Bubble tries to give Princess Daleela the ideal hotel experience by guessing what the Princess wants instead of asking her. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: S'no Problem: Bubble throws the hotel's temperature out of whack when she tries to create the perfect snow for Picassno, her snow-sculpting guest. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom
programme.desc: Zip Zap Zooooom!: It's the Great Rainbow Rally, a friendly Kingdom-wide competition, but Grizelda is so focused on winning that she puts the other racers in trouble. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Esme and Roy
programme.desc: A True Monsterpiece: Simon wants to make a painting worthy of a museum, but he can't get his paintings to turn out the way he wants. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Jeremy and Jazzy Compilations
programme.desc: I'm Sorry / Bath Time / Dancing On A Feeling / Raindrops / Cleanup Song: Jeremy and Jazzy learn about the days of the week, the water cycle and bath time through song and dance. (S1 Ep104)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Catboy's Cat: Catboy is taken by the idea of having a cat sidekick, and accidentally gets embroiled in Pharaoh boy's megalomaniac plan to be ruler of HQ. (S4 Ep47)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Mad with Moon Power: The PJ think Luna and Motsuki are causing Moon trouble. But it's Pharaoh. (S4 Ep48)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Pharaoh and the Ninjalinos: When Night Ninja needs the PJs' help, our heroes can't help taking advantage of it. (S4 Ep49)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Pharaoh's Boomerangs: Pharaoh Boy absorbs the PJ's powers into his boomerangs. (S4 Ep50)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Ayati's Big Birthday: It's Ayati's birthday, and it's a BIG one - 200! The four little dinos want to each give her a present. Rocky wants to give her the best present ever! (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: A Giganto Gallery: When Marsh steps on one of Tiny's blank canvases with paint on his feet, Tiny thinks he has a talent for art and wants to show his work in her art show. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Tyra's School Project: At school, the dinosaurs get a homework assignment-to make a presentation about Dinocity. One student decides to present about the town's architecture. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Figure Hockey: Have you ever tried to combine things that don't go together?Such as eating soup with marshmallows, putting on a dress with a skirt, or playing... figure hockey? (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Today on the playground everyone is gathered around Fangosaur. There is a good reason for that - Fangosaur has lost a tooth! And now Dinofairy is exchanging it for money. (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Potion: Molang and Piu Piu are assistants to a druid who makes very smelly potions...Things become complicated when the druid takes part in a competition. (S5 Ep16)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Troubadours: After Molang and Piu Piu saved the king, he offers them a special gift... armour, a shield and a sword to go and chase off the dragon! (S5 Ep17)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Mummy Star: Piu Piu falls into a hole in the Egyptian desert. Molang goes to help him, and they find themselves face to face with a mummy. (S5 Ep18)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: My Lovely Fairy: Molang and Piu Piu find a sick fairy. They take her to Merlin, who prepares some medication. But one of Piu Piu's feathers turns the medicine into a love potion... (S5 Ep19)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The King Pig: The king is fed up with all his responsibilities and wants to go on holidays. When he throws his crown and it lands on a pig, Molang and Piu Piu come up with an idea. (S5 Ep20)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Super Treasure Island: Petula wishes she were rich so she could travel to faraway places, so Ollie draws her a treasure island. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Photo Safari: The MiniWhats have presentations to prepare for school. Ollie draws a car and they set off on a safari to prehistoric times. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Class Trip To The Moon: The class trip is the same every year. If only they'd go to the moon for a change... Ollie draws a rocket and off they go! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Desperately Seeking Pixie Dust: Except for Mixo, the MiniWhats don't like eating vegetables. Ollie draws a table, and they find themselves at Giacommo's. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Under The Bed: Pamela has had trouble sleeping ever since her Teddy Bear disappeared under her bed. Ollie helps the MiniWhats find it. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Sneaky Swipers: When things begin to disappear from Dino Ranch, Blitz and the gang discover the importance of knowing the facts before jumping to conclusions. (S1 Ep19)
